item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Welcome to my redesigned blog!

I used Pelican, Github and a little Angular.js to make it look somewhat dynamic. Maybe I'll add some more animations too. For the styling, I used Pure.css as base.

I hope to spend more time blogging to help me reflect on my code and show off some practice projects. I'll also blog about some of the things I buy online. Hopefulle I'll be blogging more about productive stuff rather that personal stuff. Let's see how it goes this time around.

For those familiar, you'll quickly recognize the inspiration for this blog's design - the NES console. Love that machine! Lots of childhood hours well spent in front of the TV.

retro gaming
item.dc:creator: Josef Monje
